data.name: Amplify Qantas Signature
data.description: Our top tier credit card for Qantas Points lovers

features.additionalValue: Earn Qantas points on eligible purchases and redeem them for Qantas flights and upgrades, as well as merchandise from the Qantas Store.
2 Qantas Lounge Passes when you register your details at the below link

features.additionalInfo: Earn points twice on purchases with Qantas Frequent Flyer Program partners ? once with your card and once with the program partner

Earn 0.75 points per dollar spent on eligible purchases with Australian and overseas merchants, uncapped. From 1 January 2022,  earn 0.75 Qantas Points per $1 up to a maximum of $250,000 spent on eligible purchases annually.
Up to 55 days Interest free on purchases when you pay the Closing Balance (or the Monthly Payment Balance with a balance transfer) on time.

features.additionalValue: More ways to pay with Apple Pay, Google Pay, Samsung Pay.

Access to Interstate Flight Inconvenience Insurance and Rental Vehicle Excess in Australia cover, up to 6 months' complimentary cover for international travel insurance, plus extended warranty, purchase protection for up to 4 months' and overseas transit accident insurance. (terms, conditions, exclusions and eligibility criteria apply)

features.additionalInfo: An extra card : For an additional cardholder aged 16 or over at no extra cost, provided the account isn't a joint account. Additional card transactions are the responsibility of the primary account holder.

0% p.a. interest on balance transfers for 24 months when requested at card application. 1% balance transfer fee applies if you make a balance transfer. The variable cash advance rate will apply after this promotional period. New cards only.
90,000 bonus Qantas Points, when you spend $6k+ on eligible purchases in the first 90 days from new card approval.

features.additionalValue: SMS and email alerts are available for the product

features.additionalInfo: Feel confident using our cards, with 24/7 fraud monitoring, Secure Online Shopping Service, and the St George Fraud Money Back Guarantee.

Get interstate flight inconvenience insurance, up to 6 months' complimentary cover for overseas travel insurance, plus extended warranty, purchase security for up to 4 months' and transit accident insurance.
Birthday bonus points : Within 4 weeks of your birthday, receive an additional 10% of the points earned in the last 12 months.
Exclusive to Amplify Signature cardholders, our Concierge Service allows you to explore and book experiences online, including hard-to-find tickets, last-minute reservations and more

You can use your Card to make a Purchase or a Cash Advance or carry out a Balance Transfer from another Credit Card. You can use your Card in many places in Australia and around the world. Look for the Visa and Mastercard signs that match those shown on your Card. If your Card is accepted by a Merchant, branch or ATM provider you can use it to: Pay for Purchases, through payment terminals, e.g. at a shop, etc.  online, within a mobile app, by telephone,  through mail order Withdraw Cash, at an ATM,  at a Bank branch.
Recurring payments - You may authorise a Merchant to charge recurring payments to your Card automatically without requesting your authorisation on each occasion

Confirming and authorising transactions :  There are a number of ways you may be able to confirm a transaction. These include: signing your name. Holding your Card in  front of a contactless payment device. Entering your PIN. Entering your Card details and any other information required.
Gambling blocks : If you wish to limit access to gambling services through the Card Account, please call us or log into your online banking and activate gambling block in the Card Services menu.

Statements : We will issue a statement for the Card Account to you every month unless the account has a balance of $10 or less and there has been no account activity in that month. You can choose to receive statements by mail or electronically.

Plan&Pay : A Plan&Pay is an instalment plan that helps you split a large eligible Purchase and part or all of your Credit Card balance into manageable instalments. When you set up a Plan&Pay your Card Account balance will be split into: a Plan&Pay Balance ? this will include all of your active Plan&Pays, your Main Account Balance, which is made up of any remaining amounts.
Tracking your points balance: Your Card statement will show for the period covered any Points earned to your Qantas Frequent Flyer Account.
Access to Visa's Luxury Hotel Collection, giving you the best available rate guarantee and upgrade benefits when available.
Access to My Offer Hub : My Offers Hub is a collection of offers and discounts available to eligible debit or credit cardholders to thank you for being our customer.
Autopay facility is available. With Autopay, you can choose to pay off your Minimum Payment Due or your full closing balance each month.

eligibility.additionalInfo: Should have permanent residency in Australia/NZ OR  is a non-resident or migrant and hold an acceptable Visa, with a minimum 1 year before expiry
Should have a regular, verifiable Australian taxable income
Should have a fixed, verifiable residential address in Australia.

fees.name: Foreign Transaction Fee
fees.additionalInfo: 3% of the Australian dollar value for transactions with merchants based overseas

fees.name: Overlimit Fee
fees.additionalInfo: $15.00 once per statement period if your credit card account was opened before 4 June 2012. No overlimit fee will be charged for personal credit card accounts opened on or after 4 June 2012.

fees.name: Copy of a deposit or withdrawal form

lendingRates.additionalInfo: 19.74% p.a. variable interest rate on purchases
21.49% p.a. variable cash advance interest rate
